Functions
ayFX_InitBank
void ayFX_InitBank(
void* bank
)

Setup the ayFX replayer

Paramaters
bank

ayFX_PlayBank
u8 ayFX_PlayBank(
u8 id,
u8 prio
)

Play a ayFX sound

Paramaters
id

Sound index in the bank

prio

Priority of the sound (0-15). 0 is the highest priority.

Return

Error number (if any). See <AYFX_ERROR>.

Paramaters
file

Pointer to AFX file data

void ayFX_Mute()
